entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. POP 30%
